posts.post_content:
Hello, I am looking for any of the following T213-2's.  Graded or ungraded.  Beat up and wrinkled is fine.  Writing and paper loss is fine.  I am trying to keep the cost down a little, so I would prefer lower grade cards.  I will pay a few bucks extra for cards that are already graded by SGC because I am slowly 
getting my entire set graded by SGC.

I will trade for anything in my eBay store. One item, a combination of items, or a combination of my items and cash.  Everything is available for trade. 

Thank you, Rick   

(Got two already - let's hear from someone else.)
